    Class
    Description
    class 
    Boss
    Abstract class to represent the Boss class in the game.
    class 
    Character
    Abstract class to represent a character in the game.
    A Character is a moving entity that can engage in combat with Mobs and interact with NPCs.
    It is controlled by the user.
    class 
    Mob
    Represents a mob in the game.

    3 defense points

    It has the Focus ability

    Represents the JetBat Mob entity in the game.

    1 defense points
    5 dice faces
    4 experience points drop
    2 money drop.
    It has the DodgeFlying ability
